author: sdeboy
msg: - Modified detail pane update implementation in an attempt to improve swing thread safety.
- Notifying table model listeners from inside swing thread

author: sdeboy
msg: - Corrected row selection and detail pane synchronization bugs related selection of nodes in the logger tree and docking/undocking.
- Dock now re-selects the docked tab.

author: yoavs
msg: Updated download locations for fellow Apache Logging Services projects.

author: yoavs
msg: Corrected broken link on plan page, broke out ports into two sections: one for Apache Logging Services projects, and one for others.
